title: What’s the point of getting rid of toxicity so much
body: Seriously wtf. If words hurt so much why are you playing a game known for toxicity

replies.body: Why are you playing a game with a known punishment system for toxicity if you're gonna be toxic?
It's amusing to see this as your follow-up post.
That was a wholly uncalled for and incredibly crass comment.
And who gives a shit? Everyone’s toxic and ban happy

I do, obviously, and possibly the person who's mother you insulted in what is likely the most childish way possible. Not everyone is toxic, otherwise everyone would eventually get punished. I've never gotten a single punishment.

>Whines about being punished on a game known for it's punishment rules.
>Calls me a snowflake.

Also, I'm not perfect, I'm just obviously not toxic. Not to say I never have bad days. I do have bad days, I flame, I get frustrated, but I know to not keep playing when I've already got a few bad games under my belt. I just go and dick around on ARAM, or play Smite, or Stardew Valley, or plan for my next DnD meet, relaxing stuff. It's simple stuff, I walk away when it's getting to me.
Well good job at staying under the radar. I have one ONE fucking bad game and I get banned

Must've been one crazy bad game for you to go straight to a punishment, since it's based on consistency vs. severity. So since it's one game it's obviously pretty severe. The only exception is ZT language, slurs, hate speech, sexism, racism, homo and trans phobia, ableism, etc. That only takes one instance in one game, but that's for a two week, if you used it enough it's a full jump to perma, but that's pretty rare from my understanding.

Plus by your own admission it was a chat restrict. You can still play, you weren't banned. Your language is intentionally misleading.
You need hugs. Let's cuddle.

I reported it and I'm moving on.  I'm used to this kind of behavior but it needs to be brought to the attention of a mod or someone because nobody deserves to be subject to it.  He's just lashing out.
Yeah, I get that. I hate that you're used to it, anonymity is a helluva drug tho.
Yeah, people love talking shit over them interwebs Lol
Yeah, but when you face literally no repercussions for what you say and do it tends to bring out the absolute worst in people.
No, not everyone is toxic.  And those that are, do get banned, yes.  Enjoy the free time, or create a new account.  Just try to do better or continue being spiteful.  Up to you m8

This is your 3rd post relating to punishments or the punishment system.

 You were clearly toxic in your last few games and if you would just own up to it and move on, you'd be stress free and would be able to go back to enjoying the game.

 It's a 10/25 game chat restriction, that's literally nothing. Your account can still be playing on without worry, just stop being rude. If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say it. It's _that_ simple.

People are trying to give you advice and suggestions and you're being toxic about that? 

9 accounts?
I’m sick of this shit. I have a blowout one game and I get chat restricted. Fuck me i guess
If it's a no tolerance offense, yeah, it can take one game.

I used to be toxic and decided to just die 43 times to the Baron Nashor in one game just because the ADC didn't heal me and I could've been alive, but now I'm reformed and actually think that suspension and loss of ranked rewards made me a much better person... I haven't been toxic in months and actually try my hardest to win games whether they are ranked or normals ( in fact I've been most honored 3 games in a row now ) plus your lucky it was just a restriction - do you know what it's like to load into a game like an unranked player when you worked so hard to reach D3 bruh I was so tilted I just played varus jungle to get myself in Bronze and plan on climbing back up next season in 9{{sticker:sg-poppy}}

Because when you see that IFS popup, you get soo happy. You can feel that you are important, and ruined the game for somebody you do not like, you are a morally superior person, so you can feel good about it.

Otherwise i see no reason to punish for something what has no gameplay effect, but then these people would not be sooo happy!
Because cyberbullying is a no no, don't be a Cyber bully.

because its bad xd ?
